extendedInfo.description: ** ATTENTION: we remind you that have direct contact with you on Facebook, Twitter or e-mail will allow us to solve the problems much faster! Thank you! **WhatWapp Entertainment, leader in the development of card games, is pleased to present the game of Italian BlackJack!We bet everyone of you has ever played this game with his own relatives during Christmas holidays!With eye-catching and colorful graphics, many animations and sound effects, the Italian BlackJack will become your favorite for Christmas!* 3 levels of difficulty* Game statistics* Customization animations and card sizeSurprises are not over!The game support multiplayer mode to challenge all your Facebook friends and all the other online players!The regional decks available within the application are kindly provided by the company TEODIMIRO DAL NEGRO SpA, a leading manufacturer of playing cards.Initially, the game includes the decks listed below:+ Bergamasche+ Milanesi+ Napoletane+ Piacentine+ Siciliane+ Trevisane+ French (Poker)+ SardeIt will soon be expanded the choice of playing cards!For any questions, error or clarification, please contact us by sending an e-mail at info@whatwapp.com, or by writing on Twitter at @ WhatWapp. This information is accessible directly from the application in the "Credits" section.Like us on Facebook by going to www.facebook.com / WhatWapp and follow @ WhatWapp on Twitter!Have fun!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Glitches a lot.. very unfair game.. takes wikked strategy to get over 50mil. But awesome good game
reviews.author: Burt D

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Facile da usare e ore di divertimento Raccomandato a tutti
reviews.author: BJ J

reviews.title: I read english
reviews.comment: I installed it and really wanted to learn how to play. However....yea there aren\'t any instructions. I\'ve clicked and checked every button and there isn\'t anything in English and no instructions. Which is cool if you know how to play, however I don\'t. So I have to uninstall.
reviews.author: KaLeigh Murri
